comment: Half of this Guatemala highlands village emptied out to the US border to claim asylum on grounds of violence and gov persecution . But the mayor and people say no gangs or crime here or even police and that only peace reigns thanks to remoteness and light community policing . <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Half of this Guatemala highlands village emptied out to the US border to claim asylum on grounds of violence and gov persecution . But the mayor and people say no gangs or crime here or even police and that only peace reigns thanks to remoteness and light community policing . <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (e / empty-01
            :ARG1 (v / village
                  :ARG1-of (ii / include-91
                        :ARG3 "1/2"
                        :ARG2 (v2 / village
                              :location (h / highland
                                    :location (c / country
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "Guatemala")))
                              :mod (t / this))))
            :ARG2 (c2 / claim-01
                  :ARG0 v
                  :ARG1 (a / asylum)
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (v3 / violence)
                              :op2 (p / persecute-01
                                    :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                                          :ARG0-of (g2 / govern-01))))))
            :direction (o / out)
            :destination (b / border-01
                  :ARG2 (c4 / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "US"))))
      :snt2 (c5 / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (s / say-01
                        :ARG0 (a4 / and
                              :op1 (p2 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG2 (m2 / mayor)))
                              :op2 (p3 / person))
                        :ARG1 (o2 / or
                              :polarity -
                              :op1 (g3 / gang)
                              :op2 (c6 / crime-02)
                              :location (h3 / here))
                        :op3 (p4 / police
                              :mod (e2 / even)))
                  :op2 (r / reign-01
                        :ARG0 (p5 / peace)
                        :mod (o3 / only)
                        :ARG1-of (c7 / cause-01
                              :ARG0 (a5 / and
                                    :op1 (r2 / remoteness)
                                    :op2 (p6 / policing-01
                                          :ARG0 (c8 / community)
                                          :ARG1-of (l / light-06))))))))

comment: " Give me your tired , your poor , Your huddled masses yearning to breathe free , The wretched refuse of your teeming shore . Send these , the homeless , tempest-tost to me , I lift my lamp beside the golden door ! "
amr:
# ::snt " Give me your tired , your poor , Your huddled masses yearning to breathe free , The wretched refuse of your teeming shore . Send these , the homeless , tempest-tost to me , I lift my lamp beside the golden door ! "
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / give-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (t / tire-01
                        :ARG1 y)
                  :op2 (p / poor
                        :domain y)
                  :op3 (m2 / mass
                        :ARG1-of (h / huddle-01)
                        :poss y
                        :ARG0-of (y2 / yearn-01
                              :ARG1 (b / breathe-01
                                    :ARG0 m2
                                    :ARG1-of (f / free-04))))
                  :op4 (r / refuse
                        :mod (w / wretched)
                        :poss (s / shore
                              :poss y
                              :ARG0-of (t2 / teem-01))))
            :ARG2 (ii / i))
      :snt2 (s2 / send-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y3 / you
                  :mod (h2 / homeless))
            :ARG1 (t3 / this)
            :ARG2 (ii2 / i))
      :snt3 (l / lift-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (l2 / lamp
                  :poss ii3)
            :location (b2 / beside
                  :op1 (d / door
                        :mod (g2 / golden)))))
